mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(COALESCE(p.approved_amount, r.final_payment_amount)), 0) AS totalRevenue, COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT r.reservation_id), 0) AS reservationCount FROM reservation r JOIN accommodation a ON a.accommodations_id = r.accommodations_id LEFT JOIN payment p ON p.reservation_id = r.reservation_id AND p.payment_status = 1 WHERE a.user_id = #{hostId} AND a.approval_status = 'APPROVED' AND r.reservation_status IN (2, 3) AND (r.payment_status = 1 OR p.payment_status = 1) AND r.checkout >= #{start} AND r.checkout < #{end}

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(COALESCE(p.approved_amount, r.final_payment_amount)), 0) FROM reservation r JOIN accommodation a ON a.accommodations_id = r.accommodations_id LEFT JOIN payment p ON p.reservation_id = r.reservation_id AND p.payment_status = 1 WHERE a.user_id = #{hostId} AND a.approval_status = 'APPROVED' AND r.reservation_status IN (2, 3) AND (r.payment_status = 1 OR p.payment_status = 1) AND r.checkout >= #{start} AND r.checkout < #{end}

SELECT MONTH(h.stat_date) AS month, COALESCE(SUM(h.revenue), 0) AS revenue, COALESCE(SUM(h.reservation_count), 0) AS reservationCount, COALESCE(AVG(h.occupancy_rate), 0) AS occupancyRate FROM host_daily_stats h WHERE h.user_id = #{hostId} AND h.stat_date >= #{start} AND h.stat_date < #{end} GROUP BY MONTH(h.stat_date) ORDER BY MONTH(h.stat_date)

SELECT MONTH(r.checkout) AS month, COALESCE(SUM(COALESCE(p.approved_amount, r.final_payment_amount)), 0) AS revenue, COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT r.reservation_id), 0) AS reservationCount, 0.0 AS occupancyRate FROM reservation r JOIN accommodation a ON a.accommodations_id = r.accommodations_id LEFT JOIN payment p ON p.reservation_id = r.reservation_id AND p.payment_status = 1 WHERE a.user_id = #{hostId} AND a.approval_status = 'APPROVED' AND r.reservation_status IN (2, 3) AND (r.payment_status = 1 OR p.payment_status = 1) AND r.checkout >= #{start} AND r.checkout < #{end} GROUP BY MONTH(r.checkout) ORDER BY MONTH(r.checkout)

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(r.checkout, '%Y-%m') AS period, COALESCE(SUM(COALESCE(p.approved_amount, r.final_payment_amount)), 0) AS revenue, 0.0 AS occupancyRate FROM reservation r JOIN accommodation a ON a.accommodations_id = r.accommodations_id LEFT JOIN payment p ON p.reservation_id = r.reservation_id AND p.payment_status = 1 WHERE a.user_id = #{hostId} AND a.approval_status = 'APPROVED' AND r.reservation_status IN (2, 3) AND (r.payment_status = 1 OR p.payment_status = 1) AND r.checkout >= #{start} AND r.checkout < #{end} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(r.checkout, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY period
